Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Philippine government documents are now free for everyone, when in fact the law only applies to first-time job seekers.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide evidence or specific examples to back up its assertion.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the assumption that the law applies to all government documents, when it actually only applies to specific documents required for employment.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the law only applies to first-time job seekers, not everyone.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the confusion and conflicting experiences mentioned in the comments, such as differing interpretations or implementation of the law.
